You heard what

Father said, right?

If our big sisters get

to act in Mother’s place, that means

I get to act in Father’s place.

So from now on you better listen to me…

Ma-Marianne!

Why aren’t

you doing your homework? You know it has to be done on time!

I was just about

to do it! Honest!

Wow.

If you get to

act in Father’s place, then why

are you being carried off?

You little...

Charles?

As for you

It’s time

for your

bath.

Hey!

14
